label: uncl2475
comment: Code specifying a time that references an event that will or has occurred.

values.label: Date of order
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of order.

values.label: Date of confirmation
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of confirmation.

values.label: Date of contract
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of contract.

values.label: Date of signature of contract
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of signature of contract.

values.label: Date of invoice
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of invoice.

values.label: Date of credit note
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of credit note.

values.label: Date of present document
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of present document.

values.label: Date of confirmation of order received
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of confirmation received.

values.label: Date invoice received
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of invoice received.

values.label: Latest date/time for bid reception
values.comment: The date when, at the latest, the bids have to be submitted. This date is required for each call for tender, either in public or private sector.

values.label: Date credit note received
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of credit note received.

values.label: Date present document received
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of present document received.

values.label: Date of resale by buyer
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of resale by the buyer.

values.label: Date proceeds of resale collected by buyer
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of resale proceeds are collected by buyer. "buyer" is a retailer. Retailer will pay his supplier when having sold goods and money received.

values.label: Date goods received by buyer
values.comment: Payment time reference is date when goods are received by buyer.

values.label: Date goods received by buyer's agent
values.comment: Payment time reference is date when goods are received by buyer's agent.

values.label: Date goods received by carrier
values.comment: Payment time reference is date when goods are received by carrier.

values.label: Date ex-works
values.comment: Payment time reference is date when goods are leaving the sellers factory.

values.label: Date goods handed over for shipment by seller or agent
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date when goods are handed over for shipment by the seller or his agent.

values.label: Date of arrival of transport
values.comment: Date the transport arrived at the agreed destination.

values.label: Date of outward frontier crossing
values.comment: Date the goods are crossing the border of the exporters country.

values.label: Date of inward frontier crossing
values.comment: Date the goods are crossing the border of the importers country.

values.label: Date of delivery of goods to establishments/domicile/site
values.comment: Date the goods are delivered at agreed place of destination.

values.label: Stipulated date for payment of documentary credit
values.comment: Date as per agreement when documentary credit is due for payment.

values.label: Stipulated date for acceptance of documentary credit
values.comment: Date as per agreement when documentary credit is accepted.

values.label: Stipulated date for negotiation of documentary credit
values.comment: Date as per agreement when documentary credit is negotiated.

values.label: Date of delivery to buyer of documents representing goods
values.comment: Date when documents representing goods are received by buyer .

values.label: Date of delivery to buyer's agent of documents representing goods
values.comment: Date when documents representing goods are received by buyer's agent.

values.label: Date of delivery to carrier of documents representing goods
values.comment: Date when documents representing goods are received by carrier.

values.label: Date of delivery to intermediary bank of documents representing good
values.comment: Date when documents representing goods are received by intermediary bank.

values.label: Date of bill of lading, consignment note or other transport document
values.comment: The date of issuance of a bill of lading, consignment note or similar transport document.

values.label: Date of receipt for loading (mate's receipt)
values.comment: Date when goods are expedited to a ship confirmed by mate's received.

values.label: Date of negotiable instrument (draft, promissory note, bank)
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date of the negotiable instrument.

values.label: Date of receipt of tool dependent initial samples plus unlimited absolute bank guarantee plus value added tax
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of receipt of tool dependent initial samples and unlimited absolute bank guarantee of a third party, who is liable to the full amount of the tooling (which is owned by the customer).

values.label: Due date of negotiable instrument
values.comment: Date when the negotiable instrument is due for payment.

values.label: Date of presentation of negotiable instrument
values.comment: Date when the negotiable instrument is presented or will be presented to drawee.

values.label: Date of acceptance of negotiable instrument
values.comment: Date when the negotiable instrument is accepted or will be accepted by drawee.

values.label: Date of acceptance of tooling
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of acceptance of tooling or set of tooling.

values.label: Date of receipt of tooling
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of receipt of tooling or set of tooling.

values.label: Date of acceptance of first samples produced under production conditions
values.comment: Payment time reference is date of acceptance of first samples produced under production conditions.

values.label: Date of start of work
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date when work begins.

values.label: Date of end of work
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date when work ends.

values.label: Date of provisional reception of work
values.comment: Date of temporary acceptance of work until final reception will take place.

values.label: Date of final acceptance of work
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date of final acceptance of work.

values.label: Date of certificate of preliminary acceptance
values.comment: Date of certificate of temporary acceptance of work until final reception will take place.

values.label: Date of certificate of final acceptance
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date of the certificate of final acceptance.

values.label: Specified date
values.comment: Date specified elsewhere.

values.label: Anticipated delivery date
values.comment: The date on which delivery is anticipated to take place.

values.label: Effective date
values.comment: The date on which an action or event becomes effective.

values.label: Invoice transmission date
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date of invoice transmission.

values.label: Date of issue of transport document(s)
values.comment: The date on which a transport document(s) is issued.

values.label: Date of presentation of documents
values.comment: Payment time reference is the date when documents are presented.

values.label: Payment date
values.comment: Date when a payment was made.

values.label: Draft(s) at ... days sight
values.comment: Draft(s) is/are due after a specific number of days after sight.

values.label: Draft(s) at ... days date
values.comment: Draft(s) is/are due after a specific number of days after date.

values.label: Draft(s) at ... days after date of issuance of transport document(s)
values.comment: Draft(s) is/are due after a specific number of days after date of issuance of transport document(s).

values.label: Draft(s) at ... days after date of presentation of documents
values.comment: Draft(s) is/are due after a specific number of days after date of presentation of documents.

values.label: Specified draft date
values.comment: Draft at specified date.

values.label: Customs clearance date (import)
values.comment: Date when goods clear Customs in the importing country.

values.label: Customs clearance date (export)
values.comment: Date when goods clear Customs in the exporting country.

values.label: Date of salary payment
values.comment: Date when a salary payment was made.

values.label: Date of shipment as evidenced by the transport document(s)
values.comment: Date of shipment as evidenced by the transport document(s).

values.label: Payment due date
values.comment: Date on which a payment is due.

values.label: Requested date of delivery
values.comment: Payment terms apply from the requested date of delivery.

values.label: Other reference date agreed upon between the parties
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
